attributes.title: This app sells your data to russia!!
attributes.review: As a Trump supporter, keeping my liberties is the number on most important thing to me, but apparently Apple doesn’t agree and WILL sell your data to the Russian govt. do yourself a favor and stay away from this app!!!

attributes.title: UNBELIEVABLE
attributes.review: THIS APP is disgusting it keeps sending me nasty texts and videos and i keep trying to block the number but it won’t let me, WHATEVER YOU DO DO NOT GET THIS APP OR IF YOU DO RATE IT A ONE STAR

attributes.title: Trash App 🤢🤢🤢🤢

attributes.title: Very User friendly
attributes.review: This is a great app. For all you Trump supporters let us this platform to defeat the Dem’s in November.

attributes.title: ✨🥰🧚🏼GARBAGE🥰🌙💫
attributes.review:
This app is TERRIBLE!!!! It is for a terrible man that has done more than questionable things!! Supporting a malicious, racist, homophobic, mysogonistic orange is DISGUSTING!  Furthermore!!! the app itself is AWFUL! It functions terribly, nothing loads, and the ads are DESPICABLE.  We don’t support the orange man, or anyone else in his administration. Every one of you needs to be out of office because the branches of the tree are just as sick as the orange. 

Racism is a virus ⚔️🪓🧨and should be destroyed 🩸💊🦠once and for all‼️‼️Trump and his people ❌should have never ❌had a position of influence 🥺😭 to the people🌌🌟✨

Your people 💇🏻‍♀️must leave 💃🏻🕺🏻🚶🏻‍♂️and ✨NEVER✨ return💖🥰🌸

You build stories on lies🤥👺and created a ✨false ✨ fantasy🦄🌈☀️💫✨🌟🦄that fooled the nation 🙈🙉

💖🌈🌟But✨ we won’t 💫🌙🌸take it anymore!!😍🥰🧚🏼

🌸💖I hope✨🦋 you all 🤩🤩 have a terrible 🥰🥰 week 💕🌺

🥰Much love XOXO💫🌙

💫🧚🏼🌈Oh and ✨EAT THE RICH✨ACAB ✨BLM✨😘🌈🌸🧚🏼

attributes.title: Horrible App!
attributes.review: Me and my husband/ cousin love Mr. TRUMp but this app just won’t do! We expected more from this app and it sure did disappoint me and my kin! I definitely don’t recommend it! Stay far, far away!

attributes.title: It kinda messed my phone up😔
attributes.review: Once I downloaded it it made my phone trip and it froze a lot So please dont

attributes.title: DONT DOWNLOAD
attributes.review: After I downloaded it my mom said she lost the duck so we went swimming and got sun burnt so she gave me dog food then the duck died and the app called me fat and ugly          🍗chicken wing 🍗chicken wing 🌭hot dog and balcony was then playing in the toilet and I died

attributes.title: The app hacked my accounts.
attributes.review: I think that the us is stealing our information. NOT CHINA but I trust trump so I guess China is stealing our information. I hope this helps get your app better. Well wishes.
